c:complexType.name: Tooltip
c:complexType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the tooltip.

c:property.name: enabled
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the tooltip is enabled.

c:property.name: className
c:property.c:documentation:
A custom class to mark the root tooltip element.
The root tooltip element is always marked with the class tipsy. This option allows you to specify an additional class to style the tooltip differently for a single chart or group of charts.

c:property.name: gravity
c:property.c:documentation:
The preferred tooltip gravity.
The default value depends on the chart type. Most use the gravity, but others, like the Pie chart, calculate an adequate gravity per visual element.
When using the preferred gravity causes the tooltip to be placed off the browser window, a more suitable gravity may be automatically chosen.

c:property.name: animate
c:property.c:documentation:
The duration for the tooltip move animation, in milliseconds.
A value of 0 disables the move animation.
The default value depends on the value of . When false, the default value is 400 ms. Otherwise, it is 0, resulting in no animation.

c:property.name: delayIn
c:property.c:documentation: The delay for the tooltip to show, in milliseconds.

c:property.name: delayOut
c:property.c:documentation: The delay for the tooltip to hide, in milliseconds.

c:property.name: offset
c:property.c:documentation:
The distance of the closest tooltip edge or corner to the visual element's tooltip anchor point, in pixel units.
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: opacity
c:property.c:documentation:
The distance of the closest tooltip edge or corner to the visual element's tooltip anchor point.
The default value depends on the chart type.

c:property.name: html
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the tooltip text that the format function builds is in HTML format.

c:property.name: format
c:property.c:documentation:
A callback function that is called to build the tooltip of a visual element.
If is true, the resulting text must be valid HTML, otherwise, it is considered plain text.

c:property.name: useCorners
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the collateral tooltip gravities should be aligned with corners.
Most chart types use a default value of false.

c:property.name: arrowVisible
c:property.c:documentation:
Indicates if the tooltip shows an arrow pointing to the visual element's anchor point.
Most chart types use a default value of true.

c:property.name: followMouse
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the visual element's anchor point should be the current mouse position.

c:property.name: fade
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if the tooltip fades in and out, after the corresponding delay has expired.
